trans-unit.source: Represents a <see langword="try" /> block with any number of <see langword="catch" /> clauses and, optionally, a <see langword="finally" /> block.
trans-unit.target: Representa um bloco <see langword="try" /> com qualquer número de cláusulas <see langword="catch" /> e, opcionalmente, um bloco <see langword="finally" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> can be used to represent a `try`/`catch` block of code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> pode ser usado para representar um `try` / `catch` bloco de código.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `try` block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.TryStatements%2A> propriedade contém as instruções para executar dentro de um `try` bloco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A> property contains the `catch` clauses to handle caught exceptions.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.CatchClauses%2A> propriedade contém o `catch` cláusulas para lidar com exceções capturadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A> property contains the statements to execute within a `finally` block.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement.FinallyStatements%2A> propriedade contém as instruções para executar dentro de um `finally` bloco.

trans-unit.source: Not all languages support `try`/`catch` blocks.
trans-unit.target: Nem todos os idiomas oferecem suporte a `try` / `catch` blocos.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.TryCatchStatements?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag to determine whether a code generator supports `try`/`catch` blocks.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> método com o <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport.TryCatchStatements?displayProperty=nameWithType> sinalizador para determinar se um gerador de código oferece suporte a `try` / `catch` blocos.

trans-unit.source: The following example code demonstrates use of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> to define a try...catch...finally statement for exception handling.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso de um <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement> para definir um bloco try...... finally instrução catch para manipulação de exceção.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that indicate the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> que indicam as instruções a experimentar.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> que indicam as cláusulas a capturar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class using the specified statements for try and catch clauses.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> usando as instruções especificadas para as cláusulas try e catch.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that indicate the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> que indicam as instruções a experimentar.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> objects that indicate the clauses to catch.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClause" /> que indicam as cláusulas a capturar.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> objects that indicate the finally statements to use.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatement" /> que indicam as instruções finally a usar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> class using the specified statements for try, catch clauses, and finally statements.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeTryCatchFinallyStatement" /> usando as instruções especificadas para as cláusulas try e catch, bem como as instruções finally.

trans-unit.source: Gets the catch clauses to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as cláusulas catch a usar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection" /> that indicates the catch clauses to use.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeCatchClauseCollection" /> que indica as cláusulas catch para usar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the finally statements to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as instruções finally a usar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> that indicates the finally statements.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> que indica as instruções finally.

trans-unit.source: Gets the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as instruções a experimentar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> that indicates the statements to try.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection" /> que indica as instruções para experimentar.
